benchmark_details.name: WebApp1K
benchmark_details.overview: WebApp1K is a novel benchmark for evaluating large language models (LLMs) in test-driven development (TDD) tasks, where test cases serve as both prompt and verification for code generation. It comprises 1000 diverse challenges across 20 application domains.
benchmark_details.data_type: code generation prompts and verification tests

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To identify key LLM capabilities for TDD task success and evaluate the performance of LLMs on TDD tasks.

data.source: Generated using human-designed tasks across various application domains.
data.annotation: Human-generated test cases and expected outputs.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the ratio of successful test passes to total test cases attempted.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in generating correct code that passes the provided tests.
methodology.validation: Evaluation over multiple iterations on each task.
